data.title: Pitch Perfect (2012)
data.text:
July 15, 2024

Free Event, no registration needed

Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining the a cappella group The Bellas as they take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, and Britney Snow

Movie Mondays overview

Enjoy free family fun this summer with the return of Movie Mondays on the Julianne and George Argyros Plaza! Enjoy hit movies, engaging pre-movie activities, and connect with partner organizations at their info booths. Treat yourself to tasty food truck offerings, refreshing drinks from George’s Café, or bring your own picnic dinner. Plus, don’t miss the chance to win exciting prizes!

Guests are welcome to arrive beginning at 5:30 pm, with the movie starting at dusk (approximately 8 pm). Pre-show activities are available from 6–7:30 pm. Bring your own snacks, chairs, blankets, and picnics, but please note that tables, BBQs, or large food set-ups are not permitted. No outside alcohol is allowed, but those 21+ can purchase alcohol at George’s Café. Don’t forget your beach chairs and blankets for a cozy and enjoyable night under the stars.

Closed captioning will be included at all showings!

Food trucks*: Graze Burgers and Zero Point Five

*Subject to change.
